mapper.select: select if(count(*) > 0, 1, 0) as result from academy_registration_tb where ACADEMY_ID = #{academyId};
select at.ACADEMY_ID, at.ACA_NM, at.FA_RDNMA, at.FA_RDNDA, at.REALM_SC_NM, at.LE_CRSE_LIST_NM from academy_tb at where at.ACADEMY_ID = #{ACADEMY_ID}
select ait.logo_img, ait.class_size, ait.course_period, ait.purpose, ait.home_page, ait.phone from academy_info_tb ait where ait.ACADEMY_ID = #{ACADEMY_ID}

select ct.convenience_name from academy_info_tb ait left outer join academy_convenience_tb act on(act.academy_info_id = ait.academy_info_id) left outer join convenience_tb ct on(ct.convenience_id = act.convenience_id) where ait.ACADEMY_ID = #{ACADEMY_ID}

select agt.age_range from academy_info_tb ait left outer join attendance_age_tb aat on(aat.academy_info_id = ait.academy_info_id) left outer join age_tb agt on(agt.age_id = aat.age_id) where ait.ACADEMY_ID = #{ACADEMY_ID}
select cit.class_name, cit.class_price from academy_info_tb ait left outer join class_info_tb cit on(cit.academy_info_id = ait.academy_info_id) where ait.ACADEMY_ID = #{ACADEMY_ID}

select art.academy_registration_id, art.ACADEMY_ID, at.ACA_ASNUM, at.ACA_NM, at.ADMST_ZONE_NM, art.match, art.user_id, art.business_registration_file, art.id_file, art.operation_registration_file, art.approval_status, art.reject_reason from academy_registration_tb art left outer join academy_tb at on(at.ACADEMY_ID = art.ACADEMY_ID) where art.user_id = #{userId} and art.approval_status < 1 order by art.approval_status asc, art.academy_registration_id desc limit #{index}, 5
select count(*) from academy_registration_tb art where user_id = #{userId} and art.approval_status < 1
